title: Root & Shaw - Hope (Can't Pretend)
author: S. O.
comment: I can't wait until she comes back after her pregnancy so we can have more moments with Root and Shaw!!! Shaw we miss you!! :D
This video was amazing, I have goosebumps all over me. Thank you for doing these videos, they always make my day ^^
I'm not crying i just have a tree in my eyes.
This video is..wow.. took my heart lovely
description:
Root won't give up on Shaw. No matter what. She'll find her.

Spoiler awareness: Contains scenes till episode 4.15

Song: Can't Pretend by Tom Odell

No copyright infringement intended.
All clips on this video are from Person of Interest, that belongs to CBS.
